delete.dialogConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the multimode rules?

description: Multimode allows to specify rules that will trigger a change in the survey collect method from web to interviewer.

error.formulaNotVtl: Multimode is available only to questionnaires using VTL.

form.noRoundaboutVariables: Rule cannot be specified if there is no roundabout, or no variables associated to the roundabout.

howToUse: These rules may be specified in VTL from collected data to determinate when the survey collect method must be made by an interviewer. They can be specified on survey-level and/or on roundabout level.
new: Specify multimode rules for the questionnaire
noQuestionnaireRule: There is no rule at the questionnaire level.
noLeafRule: There is no rule at the roundabout level.
title: Multimode
versionNoMultimode: Multimode has not been specified in this version.
